title: 219 - The 3 Journeys to Creative Transcendence & How to Know Which You're Stuck On
description:
Do you feel like you haven't quite hit that level that you've been searching for in your creative career?

Maybe you know you haven't quite made it where you want to go, but you're not really sure where you're stuck?

In this episode, we discuss the 3 journey's every creative person much travel to get to the place we all want to go: CREATIVE TRANSCENDENCE!

What is creative transcendence? Well, you know it when you see it. It's that inflection point that happens when an artist is making truly AUTHENTIC WORK that DEEPLY RESONATES with an audience. It's what we all want right??

Well, if you study those who've found this creative promised land, you'll discover what I did: getting to this place isn't random, it's not magic, it's not luck... there's a pattern and this pattern is THE 3 JOURNEYS.

Listen today to figure out which of these journey's you're stuck on and how to get unstuck by doing the right type of work!

SHOW NOTES
Billy Eichner on WTF
http://www.wtfpod.com/podcast/episode-949-billy-eichner

George Carlin Interview
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZZGo6mWjk4Y&t=25s

Creative Career Path Handbook
https://www.etsy.com/listing/630655200/the-creative-career-path-handbook?ref=shop_home_feat_1

Conferences

Dreamtopia Workshop with Cathy Heller & Friends in L.A.
PROMO CODE: ANDY for 30% OFF
SIGN UP NOW! bit.ly/andydreamtopia

PROMO CODE: CPT50 for $50 off
https://www.creativeworks.co/skillcamp/

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
